name: PureBasic Syntax file
description: All keywords and predefined functions are highlighted as well as type suffixes, constants and numbers. The folding of procedures still needs some tweaking.
install_details:
besides copying the file into the syntax directory and additional entry for filetype.vim has to be made, associating the extension pb:

"PureBasic
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.pb setf purebasic
